newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: ENDEMOL SEES 15-20 PCT PROFIT RISE IN 1996/97.
newsitem.headline: ENDEMOL SEES 15-20 PCT PROFIT RISE IN 1996/97.

text.p: Endemol Entertainment said on Friday it expected its turnover and net profit to rise by 15 to 20 percent in the current 1996/97 financial year which began on August 1.
"The company expects to be able to double its turnover and net profit within five years," Endemol said.
Television production and live entertainment company Endemol Entertainment plans a flotation of its shares on the Amsterdam Stock Exchange later this year.
Endemol's net profit in the financial year 1995/96 rose 38.5 percent to 60.5 million guilders. Turnover rose from 468.4 million guilders in 1994/95 to 642.4 million guilders.
